By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, July 6, 2005 - 08:53 pm:

\table{Monster,,,,,
\red{Bob},
,\red{winner},
\red{Connie},
,,\purple{winner}
\blue{Ben},
,\blue{winner},
\blue{Jerry},
,,,\b{winner},
\orange{Carol},
,\orange{winner},
\orange{Ted},
,,\rgb{998800,winner}
\green{Alice},
,\green{winner},
\green{Robert},}
